A4: From 2008-2013 in CT, in-school arrests dropped 34.8%, expulsions declined 31% and out-of-school suspensions fell 46.5% #BrownsPromise
A4: Better options exist - CT has made strides in addressing school discipline thru the "school based diversion initiative" #BrownsPromise
A4: An arrest doubles the odds that a student will drop out, after a first-time court appearance those odds quadruple #BrownsPromise
A4: Offenses that once resulted in a trip to the principal's office now carry the possibility of a court appearance or worse #BrownsPromise
A4: Zero tolerance policies have fed the school-to-prison pipeline, disproportionately affecting Black & Latino students #BrownsPromise
A3: All schools = low performers, schools w subgroups being left behind, where students aren't leaving college/career ready #BrownsPromise
A3: #ESEA needs to ensure states are held accountable for providing equitable supports and resources to all schools #BrownsPromise
A2: #ESEA must stipulate help for schools that are chronically low-performing or consistently missing goals for students #BrownsPromise
A2: #ESEA must ensure the expectation of academic achievement & graduation are meaningful parts of any accountability system #BrownsPromise
A2: However, #ESEA is missing two key elements to ensure that states are focused on the academic success of ALL children #BrownsPromise
A2: #ESEA includes some strong accountability provisions to ensure opportunities for students & flexibility for local needs #BrownsPromise

4 tests for ISIS strategy: 3) stay out of the Syrian civil war; this could badly backfire on US if we get it wrong.
